CapabilityArn.description: Returns an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a specific AWS resource, such as a capability, partnership, profile, or transformer.

CapabilityId.description: Returns a system-assigned unique identifier for the capability.

CreatedAt.description: Returns a timestamp for creation date and time of the capability.

ModifiedAt.description: Returns a timestamp that identifies the most recent date and time that the capability was modified.

CapabilityConfiguration.description: A capability object. Currently, only EDI (electronic data interchange) capabilities are supported. A trading capability contains the information required to transform incoming EDI documents into JSON or XML outputs.

CapabilityDirection.description: Specifies whether this is capability is for inbound or outbound transformations.

InputLocation.description: Contains the Amazon S3 bucket and prefix for the location of the input file, which is contained in an `S3Location` object.

OutputLocation.description: Contains the Amazon S3 bucket and prefix for the location of the output file, which is contained in an `S3Location` object.

TransformerId.description: Returns the system-assigned unique identifier for the transformer.

Type.description: Returns the type of the capability. Currently, only `edi` is supported.

EdiConfiguration.description: Specifies the details for the EDI (electronic data interchange) transformation.

BucketName.description: Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket.

Key.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 key for the file location.

S3Location.description: Specifies the details for the Amazon S3 file location that is being used with AWS B2B Data Interchange. File locations in Amazon S3 are identified using a combination of the bucket and key.

TransactionSet.description: Returns an enumerated type where each value identifies an X12 transaction set. Transaction sets are maintained by the X12 Accredited Standards Committee.

Version.description: Returns the version to use for the specified X12 transaction set.

description: Instantiates a capability based on the specified parameters. A trading capability contains the information required to transform incoming EDI documents into JSON or XML outputs.

Configuration.description: Specifies a structure that contains the details for a capability.

InstructionsDocuments.description: Specifies one or more locations in Amazon S3, each specifying an EDI document that can be used with this capability. Each item contains the name of the bucket and the key, to identify the document's location.

Name.description: The display name of the capability.

Tags.description: Specifies the key-value pairs assigned to ARNs that you can use to group and search for resources by type. You can attach this metadata to resources (capabilities, partnerships, and so on) for any purpose.

Type.description: Returns the type of the capability. Currently, only `edi` is supported.
